mapper.select: SELECT rsg.name_ as siteName, IFNULL(al.count,0) as count, IFNULL(pub.pubCount,0) as pubCount FROM resource_station_group rsg left join ( SELECT site_id, count( id_ ) AS count FROM station_template where resource_publication_date between #{queryVo.startTime} and #{queryVo.endTime} GROUP BY site_id ) al left join ( SELECT site_id, count( id_ ) AS pubCount FROM station_template where resource_publication_date between #{queryVo.startTime} and #{queryVo.endTime} and status_ = 2 GROUP BY site_id ) pub on al.site_id = pub.site_id on rsg.id_ = al.site_id where rsg.enable_ = 1 order by al.count desc
